Posts.Content: suzdtoflois wrote: Hi, all I started chemo in April of 2009 and had my last period the end of April. Finished Chemo in September of '09 - Well, February 14th, I started my period and I am still flowing - 29 days. some days are light, others are heavy -no consistency what so ever. Anyway, called ocn - they discussed symptoms with me asking lots of questions, advised me to call gyn. Gyn asked in I were extremely weak or if I had passed out yet - no - they made me an appt for June and told me to keep track what was going on. I personnally think 29 days is quite a long time - anyone else going through similar? Suzanne 10/09 LT Mod Rad Mx, RT Pro Mx - 1/10 TE Dx 3/13/2009, IDC, 6cm+, Stage IIIB, 0/13 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Menstrual Periods after Chemo - ?? suzdtoflois suzdtoflois

Posts.Content: Mar 18, 2010 10:25AM suzdtoflois wrote: Thanks for the comments and concerns - I went to a new gyn yesterday and she did a biopsy and prescribed progesterone for 12 days - will hear back the results of the biopsy next Wed or Thurs - Again, thanks! Suzanne
